member.summary: Gets or sets the seconds from the beginning of the media to start playback

member.summary: Gets or sets the ordered number of the queue item

member.summary: Gets or sets the item id array

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of media artifact

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.QueueStatus.ChangeTypeString
member.summary: Gets or sets the item id array

member.name: T:GoogleCast.Models.Media.RepeatMode
member.summary: Possible states of queue repeat mode

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.RepeatMode.RepeatOff
member.summary: Items are played in order, and when the queue is completed (the last item has ended) the media session is terminated

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.RepeatMode.RepeatAll
member.summary: The items in the queue will be played indefinitely. When the last item has ended, the first item will be played again

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.RepeatMode.RepeatSingle
member.summary: The current item will be repeated indefinitely

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.RepeatMode.RepeatAllAndShuffle
member.summary: The items in the queue will be played indefinitely. When the last item has ended, the list of items will be randomly shuffled by the receiver, and the queue will continue to play starting from the first item of the shuffled items.

member.name: T:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle
member.summary: Describes style information for a text track

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background 32 bit RGBA color
member.remarks: the alpha channel should be used for transparent backgrounds

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.EdgeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the RGBA color for the edge
member.remarks: this value will be ignored if EdgeType is None

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.EdgeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the text track edge type

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family
member.remarks: if the font is not available in the receiver, the fontGenericFamily will be used

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.FontGenericFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the text track generic family

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.FontScale
member.summary: Gets or sets font scaling factor for the text track

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.FontStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text track font style

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground 32 bit RGBA color

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.WindowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the 32 bit RGBA color for the window
member.remarks: this value will be ignored if WindowType is None

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.WindowRoundedCornerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the rounded corner radius absolute value in pixels (px)
member.remarks: this value will be ignored if windowType is not RoundedCorners

member.name: P:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackStyle.WindowType
member.summary: Gets or sets the window type
member.remarks: the window concept is defined in CEA-608 and CEA-708. In WebVTT is called a region

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackType.Subtitles
member.summary: Transcription or translation of the dialogue, suitable for when the sound is available but not understood

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackType.Captions
member.summary: Transcription or translation of the dialogue, sound effects, relevant musical cues, and other relevant audio information, suitable for when the soundtrack is unavailable

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackType.Descriptions
member.summary: Textual descriptions of the video component of the media resource, intended for audio synthesis when the visual component is unavailable

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackType.Chapters
member.summary: Chapter titles, intended to be used for navigating the media resource

member.name: F:GoogleCast.Models.Media.TextTrackType.Metadata
member.summary: Tracks intended for use from script

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of track

member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the tracks content
